segments.text: I see the boy stretching up, his determination evident in every line of his body.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a certain bravery in what he’s doing, but it’s profoundly irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he’s balancing, it feels like he’s dancing on the edge of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, she’s just standing there, arms open, waiting for her prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues drying her dishes, utterly unconcerned with the troubles around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost as if the weight of their actions is lost on her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is so serene and orderly, like a postcard image.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How contrasting it is to the chaos this kitchen represents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a mix of admiration and frustration for the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what this moment will look back on, if they succeed or fall.
segments.speaker: PAR
